about_the_game:
Tulgey Wood is a magical adventure game inspired by the classic tale of Alice in Wonderland. Players will take on the role of Alice as they embark on a thrilling journey through the enchanting and unpredictable world of Wonderland, solving puzzles and unlocking secrets along the way. The objective of the game is to help Alice find all the keys hidden within each level, which will grant her access to the next stage of her journey.

Set within the whimsical and mysterious Tulgey Wood, players will encounter a variety of well-known characters from the original story, such as the Cheshire Cat, the White Rabbit, and the Mad Hatter. These characters will offer helpful advice and occasionally pose challenges, adding depth and excitement to the gameplay.

Throughout the game, players will need to utilize their creativity and critical thinking skills to overcome a range of obstacles, from riddles to complex puzzles. The game features vibrant and imaginative visuals, creating a captivating atmosphere that immerses players in the fantastical world of Wonderland.

Tulgey Wood is designed for players of all ages, with easy-to-understand controls and a user-friendly interface. The game offers a perfect balance of fun and challenge, with an engaging storyline that will keep players entertained for hours on end.

Embark on this incredible journey through the surreal and mesmerizing Tulgey Wood, where you'll navigate treacherous paths, solve mind-bending puzzles, and help Alice unlock the secrets of this enchanted realm. Are you ready to venture into the depths of Wonderland and discover what lies beyond the looking glass?
